CPNS 2019, Batam Buka Lowongan 140 Kursi
03 Nov 2019, 12:33 by Bisnis.com, Ali Akhmad Noor Hidayat
TEMPO.CO, BATAM - Pemerintah Kota Batam akan membuka pendaftaran Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil (CPNS) tahun 2019. Pendaftaran rencananya diumumkan dalam waktu dekat ini.
Batam mendapatkan kuota sebanyak 140 formasi dari Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (Kemen PAN-RB).
Wakil Wali Kota Batam Amsakar Achmad mengatakan pihaknya saat ini masih menyiapkan mekanisme pendaftaran CPNS di Kota Batam.
Meskipun belum bisa memastikan kapan akan diumumkan, ia memastikan akan segera membuka pendaftaran sesuai dengan mekanisme yang ada.
"Nanti akan segera diumumkan, kita masih menyiapkan mekanisme dan prosedurnya," kata Amsakar, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Dijelaskan Amsakar 140 formasi tersebut murni CPNS, tidak termasuk Pegawai Pemerintah dengan Perjanjian Kerja (PPPK). Menurut Amsakar mekanisme penerimaan CPNS dan PPPK berbeda, dan kuota yang diberikan pemerintah pusat tersebut saat ini adalah untuk CPNS.
"ASN (Aparatur Sipil Negara) memang ada PNS dan PPPK, tapi untuk saat ini untuk penerimaan CPNS," kata Amsakar.
Sekretaris Daerah (Sekda) Kota Batam Jefridin mengatakan penentuan kuota CPNS untuk Batam tersebut tertuang dalam Keputusan Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi nomor 668 tahun 2019 tentang kebutuhan PNS di lingkungan Pemko Batam.
Rinciannya yaitu tenaga pendidikan sebanyak 71 formasi, tenaga kesehatan 42 formasi, dan tenaga teknis sebanyak 27 formasi.
“Dari pengajuan 1.980 ASN baru, yang disetujui 140 kuota. Surat keputusannya sudah kami terima,” kata Jefridin.
Pemko Batam sebelumnya mengusulkan calon ASN 860 formasi dengan rincian tenaga pendidikan sebanyak 218 kuota, tenaga kesehatan sebanyak 151 orang. Dan tenaga teknis sebanyak 491 orang.
“Pengajuan Calon PPPK (pegawai pemerintah dengan perjanjian kerja) dengan total 1.120 orang, tenaga pendidikan sebanyak 774, tenaga kesehatan sebanyak 216 sedangkan teknis 128 orang,” ucapnya.
Pengajuan kebutuhan Calon ASN oleh Pemko Batam ini pada 17 Juni 2019 lalu. Kuota 140 calon ASN ini juga akan dirapatkan lebih lanjut di Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN) Pekanbaru.

CPNS 2019, Batam Open Vacancies 140 Seats
03 Nov 2019, 12:33 by Bisnis.com, Ali Akhmad Noor Hidayat
TEMPO.CO, BATAM - The Batam City Government will open registration for Prospective Civil Servants (CPNS) in 2019. Registration is planned to be announced in the near future.
Batam got a quota of 140 formations from the Ministry of Administrative and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemen PAN-RB).
Deputy Mayor of Batam Amsakar Achmad said that his party is currently still preparing the registration mechanism for CPNS in Batam City.
Although not yet sure when it will be announced, he ensures that it will immediately open registration in accordance with the existing mechanism.
"Later it will be announced soon, we are still preparing the mechanism and procedures," Amsakar said, Sunday (11/03/2019).
Amsakar 140 explained that the formation was pure CPNS, not including Government Employees with Work Agreements (PPPK). According to Amsakar the mechanism for receiving CPNS and PPPK is different, and the current quota given by the central government is for CPNS.
"ASN (State Civil Apparatus) does indeed have civil servants and PPPK, but for now for CPNS acceptance," said Amsakar.
The Regional Secretary (Sekda) of Batam City, Jefridin, said that the determination of the CPNS quota for Batam was contained in the Decree of the Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform number 668 in 2019 regarding the needs of civil servants in the Batam City Government.
The details are as many as 71 formation education personnel, 42 formation health workers, and 27 formation technical personnel.
"Of the 1,980 new ASN submissions, 140 quotas were approved. We have received the decision letter, "said Jefridin.
The Pemko Batam previously proposed candidates for formation of ASN 860 with details of education personnel totaling 218 quota, health workers totaling 151 people. And 491 technical personnel.
"Submission of candidates for PPPK (government employees with work agreements) with a total of 1,120 people, as many as 774 education workers, 216 health workers while 128 technical people," he said.
Submission of the needs of ASN Candidates by the Batam Government on June 17, 2019 ago. The quota of 140 candidates for ASN will also be raised further at the Pekanbaru Civil Service Agency (BKN).
